welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Valley, the charming city known for its stunning landscapes and rich history. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis B Wilson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis B Wilson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for major and regional airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
